programme.title: 2023 NIT Basketball Tournament
programme.sub-title: Quarterfinal: North Texas at Oklahoma State
programme.desc: The No. 1 Cowboys host the No. 2 Mean Green for an NIT quarterfinal. North Texas extended its school record by winning its 28th game of the season, 75-55 over Sam Houston State in the second round. Oklahoma State ousted Eastern Washington 71-60.

programme.title: 2023 NIT Basketball Tournament
programme.desc: Power Five programs in the No. 1 Ducks (21-14) and No. 2 Badgers (19-14) meet in the NIT quarterfinals. The schools have gotten together three times in the NCAA Tournament since 2014. Wisconsin won twice before Oregon prevailed in 2019.

programme.desc: The No. 2 Commodores (22-14) clash with the No. 4 Blazers (27-9) in this NIT quarterfinal contest. Vanderbilt squeaked past Michigan 66-65 in the second round, while UAB took care of Morehead State 77-59 to advance. UAB has won 10 of its last 11.

programme.title: NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series
programme.desc: The NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series stops at Atlanta Motor Speedway for the Fr8 208. Kyle Busch won this race in 2021 and won March 3 in Las Vegas. Corey Heim is one of five series drivers with two top-10 finishes in 2023 and won this event in 2022.

programme.title: NASCAR Xfinity Racing Series
programme.desc: The NASCAR Xfinity Series season heats up with the RAPTOR 250 at Atlanta Motor Speedway. High school senior and 18-year-old Sammy Smith became the youngest Xfinity Series winner by claiming the United Rentals 200 at Phoenix Raceway on March 11.
